MS MCQs

    Get started with AI Builder

    »

    1. Which of the following statements is true?

      AI Builder is only available in Power Apps.

      AI Builder is only available in Power Automate.

      AI Builder is available in both Power Apps and Power Automate.


    2. You have customized a model by using the guided experience. What is the final step that you must take before you can use it?

      Create it

      Publish it

      Save it

      Train it


    3. What do you need to do before you can use a prebuilt model?

      Gather data

      Train the model

      Publish the model

      Nothing
